bug.summary: [BUG] We should have a separate package yaml file for the utils_nlp package
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
Right now all dependencies are generated by running "generate_conda_file.py" file to generate the .yaml file, but it would be better if we have separate dependency file for the utils_nlp package. When we release utils_nlp as a pip installable package, users are expecting to have all dependencies listed somewhere. On my Windows machine (with GPU), even the pytorch-pretrained-bert and dask packages are listed in the nlp_gpu.yaml file, it's not installed properly. I need to manually install those packages to run the notebook "entailment_multinli_bert". <denchmark-h:h3>How do we replicate the bug?</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior (i.e. solution)</denchmark-h>
